TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XRamExtension extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The X-Ram Extension is provided on the top-end Sound Blaster X-Fi solutions (Sound Blaster X-Fi Fatal1ty, Sound Blaster X-Fi Elite Pro, or later). These products feature 64MB of X-Ram that can only be used for audio purposes, which can be controlled by this Extension.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Query free X-RAM available in bytes.
Query total amount of X-RAM in bytes.
Returns True if the X-Ram Extension has been found and could be initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SetBufferMode (int n, ref int buffer, Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.XRamExtension.XRamStorage mode);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetBufferMode(int32 n, int32 buffer, valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.XRamExtension/XRamStorage mode) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of OpenAL Buffers pointed to by buffer.
An array of OpenAL Buffer handles.
The storage mode that should be used for all the given buffers. Should be the value of one of the following enum names: XRamStorage.Automatic, XRamStorage.Hardware, XRamStorage.Accessible
Docs.summary: This function is used to set the storage Mode of an array of OpenAL Buffers.
Docs.returns: True if all the Buffers were successfully set to the requested storage mode, False otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SetBufferMode (int n, ref uint buffer, Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.XRamExtension.XRamStorage mode);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetBufferMode(int32 n, unsigned int32 buffer, valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.XRamExtension/XRamStorage mode) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of OpenAL Buffers pointed to by buffer.
An array of OpenAL Buffer handles.
The storage mode that should be used for all the given buffers. Should be the value of one of the following enum names: XRamStorage.Automatic, XRamStorage.Hardware, XRamStorage.Accessible
Docs.summary: This function is used to set the storage Mode of an array of OpenAL Buffers.
Docs.returns: True if all the Buffers were successfully set to the requested storage mode, False otherwise.
